section.name: The Primitives Component
section.p: Apache Jakarta Commons Primitives provides a collection of types and utilities optimized for working with Java primitives (boolean, byte, char, double, float, int, long, short). Generally, the Commons-Primitives classes are faster, smaller and easier to work with than their purely Object based alternatives.
For more information on Commons Primitives, you might like to visit the JavaDocs, project info or project reports pages.

section.name: Status
section.p: Currently Commons Primitives contains with a stable and well-tested implementation of primitive Collection and List classes previously unreleased from the Commons Collections component.
Additional Collection-related and utility classes are planned. If you'd like to help, please contact the commons-dev mailing list and prefix emails with "[primitives]".
